SELECT o.date, o.tmin, m.tmin
FROM ghcn AS o
   INNER JOIN mn_climate AS m
     ON o.date = m.date
WHERE ABS(o.tmin - m.tmin) > 5
ORDER BY o.date ASC;

1939-04-07|19.94|30
1939-04-25|50.0|40
1942-10-06|48.02|58
1942-10-07|42.08|52
1946-09-12|55.94|46
1947-10-01|48.92|39
1947-10-16|48.92|60
1947-12-09|12.02|-12
1947-12-11|15.08|-5
1952-05-07|44.96|39
1952-05-26|50.0|44
1957-09-07|51.98|44
1958-09-12|53.06|48
1960-10-26|30.02|60
1971-04-24|30.02|60
1989-11-24|-0.04|6
1991-01-26|6.08|-6
1992-11-14|19.94|30
1993-04-07|37.04|29
1996-05-21|50.0|60
2002-07-23|57.92|52




SELECT o.date, o.tmin, m.tmin
FROM ghcn AS o
   INNER JOIN mn_climate AS m
     ON o.date = m.date
WHERE ABS(o.tmin - m.tmin) > 1.5
ORDER BY o.date ASC;

1939-04-07|19.94|30
1939-04-25|50.0|40

2002-09-29|53.06|51





SELECT o.date, o.tmin, m.tmin
FROM ghcn AS o
   INNER JOIN mn_climate AS m
     ON o.date = m.date
WHERE ABS(o.tmin - m.tmin) <= 1.5
AND ABS(o.tmin - m.tmin) > .5
ORDER BY o.date ASC;

1939-10-14|24.98|26
1940-04-22|41.0|40
1946-01-11|19.04|20
1946-01-28|15.98|15
1956-06-20|66.92|68
1959-06-16|68.0|67
1968-11-18|28.04|27
1971-03-23|12.92|12
1971-03-24|12.92|12
1976-02-08|17.96|17
1980-09-18|46.94|48
1984-05-20|48.02|47
1984-08-08|66.92|68
1984-08-15|71.06|70
1988-10-22|26.96|28
1989-04-29|35.96|37
1989-12-31|19.94|21
1997-01-06|-2.92|-4
1997-05-23|55.04|56
2002-08-23|64.94|66
2003-04-19|42.98|42
2003-04-23|41.0|42
2003-12-23|15.98|17
2008-10-20|39.02|40
